AI Description: NVIDIA Corporation is an American technology company that designs graphics processing units (GPUs) for the gaming, cryptocurrency, and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market.
Core Features:
1. Design of GPUs for gaming, cryptocurrency, and professional markets.
2. Creation of SoCs for mobile computing and automotive markets.
3. Development of high-performance computing solutions.
4. Provision of software solutions for AI, deep learning, and data analytics.
